name: thymecard
description: A health planning app for diet and exercise

scripts.count-lines: git ls-files | egrep '\.ts|\.scss$' | xargs cat | grep -v '^[[:space:]]*$' | wc -l
scripts.free-local-ports: node -e "const exec = require('child_process').execSync; const ports = [9000, 3000]; ports.forEach(port => { try { const pid = exec('lsof -ti :' + port); if (pid) { exec('kill ' + pid); console.log('Process using port ' + port + ' killed.'); } } catch (error) { console.error('No process found on port ' + port); } });"

author: Benjamin Pike
